mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_FCSINFSGMT (FCSINFSGMTSEQNO, SEX, DOB, NATION, HOUSEADD, HHDIST, CELLPHONE, EMAIL, FCSINFOUPDATE, REPORTFLAG) values (#{FcsInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{DOB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{HouseAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{HhDist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CellPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{Email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FcsInfoUpDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into PBCRS_REPORT_FCSINFSGMTM (FCSINFSGMTSEQNO, SEX, DOB, NATION, HOUSEADD, HHDIST, CELLPHONE, EMAIL, FCSINFOUPDATE, REPORTFLAG, ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS) select FCSINFSGMTSEQNO, SEX, DOB, NATION, HOUSEADD, HHDIST, CELLPHONE, EMAIL, FCSINFOUPDATE, '0', ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS from PBCRS_REPORT_FCSINFSGMT where FCSINFSGMTSEQNO = #{FcsInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_FCSINFSGMT set SEX = #{Sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOB = #{DOB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NATION = #{Nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOUSEADD = #{HouseAdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HHDIST = #{HhDist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CELLPHONE = #{CellPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{Email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCSINFOUPDATE = #{FcsInfoUpDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORTFLAG = #{reportflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where FCSINFSGMTSEQNO = #{FcsInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select FCSINFSGMTSEQNO, SEX, DOB, NATION, HOUSEADD, HHDIST, CELLPHONE, EMAIL, FCSINFOUPDATE, REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_FCSINFSGMT where FCSINFSGMTSEQNO = #{FcsInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select FCSINFSGMTSEQNO, SEX, DOB, NATION, HOUSEADD, HHDIST, CELLPHONE, EMAIL, FCSINFOUPDATE, REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_FCSINFSGMT
